titleStmt.title: The felicitie of man, or, his summum bonum. Written by Sr, R: Barckley, Kt
Discourse of the felicitie of man
titleStmt.author: Barckley, Richard, Sir, 1578?-1661.
Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Y[oung] and are sold by Rich: Roystone at his shop in Ivie Lane,

notesStmt.note: Editor's dedication signed: T. Heywood. Variant: editor's dedication signed: H.T. [sic].
First published in 1598 as: A discourse of the felicite of man.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Libraray.
